Syllabus

title: PSC 8101: Introduction to Empirical Political Analysis
text:
Topic




1. Data Visualization


2. Basic Regression (and maps tips)


3. Basic and Multiple Regression


4. Statistical Inference, Sampling, Central Limit Theorem


5. Standard Errors, Condidence Intervals, and Statistical Significance


6. Hypothesis Testing


7. More Regression Topics
